long_description: The ultralight, high-visibility Hurtta Micro vest keeps your furry friend easier to see-and therefore safer- when walking or playing off-leash in low-light conditions. Flexible adjustments at the shoulders and under the belly let you create a comfortable and customized fit for your dog. Hurtta Micro vest features a write-on tag at the neck with space for your telephone number. Note: please click on the Size Chart link next to the Color/Size menu for detailed fit information.
short_description: The ultralight, high-visibility Hurtta Micro vest keeps your furry friend easier to see-and therefore safer- when walking or playing off-leash in low-light conditions.
